email_body: Jacques, If your schedule permits, 4pm or later today would work for us. Phillip -----Original Message----- From: JacquesTC@aol.com@ENRON Sent: Saturday, July 28, 2001 9:20 AM To: Allen, Phillip K. Subject: Re: Phillip, Thanks for the prayers. Call me Monday and we will set up a time to sign up the docs. Take care. Jacques
